a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of deaths from all causes attributed to cold or heat, 2015
Sub-optimal temperatures can lead to premature deaths from conditions such as cardiovascular or kidney
Data source: Gasparrini et al. (2015). Mortality risk attributable to high and low ambient temperature: a multicountry observational study.
